name: Spider Mall!
storyline:
After getting a tip off about an abandoned shopping mall, Explorer X sets out to document the building on videotape.

Creeping round the gloomy interiors of empty shops and endless concrete corridors, he soon discovers several bored security guards on the prowl. They’re not the only inhabitants of the mall, in the shadows lurks a giant hungry spider.

This is just the start of a night of arachnophobic terror as you help X find his way out the mall, avoid the spider and make the decisions about who escapes with him.

Save the guards, or leave them to die. It’s up to you.

Either way you have to get out the mall or die trying!
summary: A night of urban exploration goes wrong for Explorer X as he finds himself trapped in an abandoned shopping mall facing off against security guards and a giant hungry spider. You make the choices in this live action bodycam FMV game. Escape the mall or die trying!
